borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">The proposed
development by reason of its location, siting, overall scale, and close
proximity to No. 24 &amp; 22 Lynnett Road, would result in an increased sense
of overbearing and a harmful loss of daylight and overshadowing to neighbouring
occupiers, therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:7.5pt;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">- National Planning
Policy Framework&nbsp;National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:7.5pt;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">- Policy D6 of the
London Plan (March 2021);<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:7.5pt;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">- Policies BP8 and
BP11 of the&nbsp;Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan
Document (DPD) (March 2011)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:7.5pt;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">- Policies DMD 1 of&nbsp;The
London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19
Submission Version, December 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p>











</p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:7.5pt;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">- The Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p>
description: Construction of a two storey 1x bedroom dwelling on the land adjacent to 24 Lynnett Road, RM8 1RL

constraints_details.result: 24 Lynnett Road, Dagenham, Barking And Dagenham, RM8 1RL

phasing_details.phase_detail: erection of a Two storey house
